name: Hello World (itch)
description:
Alexis's boyfriend Ishara has gone missing!

Solve the block pushing puzzles to find him!

... what, were you expecting more? This "game" is just a proof of concept for me to test out RPG Maker MV and itch.io.

Game Controls

Look in the options - you can view and customize your controls there.

Version History
  • v1.0.2 - 8/30/16
    • Added Keybinding plugin
    • Enabled saving and loading
  • v1.0.0 - 8/28/16
    • First release! Hello World!
Credits

This game was developed using RPG Maker MV. All of the graphics, sound, and music were procured from the base resources included with RPG Maker MV. This game also includes JavaScript libraries developed by Yanfly.

RPG Maker MV engine and assets: Copyright 2015 KADOKAWA CORPORATION/YOJIO JIMA

Ishara Comix and related characters: Copyleft 2002-2016 Barry Peddycord III
